question: What is the theme of the 2018 National Science Day (NSD)?
option2: Scientific Issues for Development of the Nation
option3: Science and Technology for a Sustainable Future
option4: Science and Technology for Specially Abled Persons
answer: Science and Technology for a Sustainable Future
explanation: The National Science Day (NSD) is observed every year on February 28 to mark the discovery of Raman effect by Physicist CV Raman on 28th February, 1928. The purpose of the day is to spread the message of importance of science and its application among the people. The theme of NSD-2018 is “Science and Technology for a Sustainable Future”, which has been chosen for the purpose of raising public appreciation of the scientific issues involved.
